entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 1 with patchy frost.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local smoke. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 with patchy frost. Forecast issued 6:16 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Snow level 1100 metres rising to 1600 metres in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:16 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
